snippet.title: Swift 4.2 Stretchy Header Collection View Cells / Header / Padding (Ep 1)
snippet.description:
In this lesson, let's get the foundation of our Stretchy Header Collection View Controller built out.  We'll start by rendering out our cells, then our headers, and finally modify our layout's padding values to get our UI going.  The last step is to figure out how to get our custom image to show up underneath our status bar for the notches of newer iPhones such as the X, XS, and XS Max.

Tinder Firestore Swipe and Match
